mdRecord.dcterms:title: Washington's Bed and Room Where he Died (December 14, 1799.)
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the Washington bedchamber with a view of the bedstead with a portrait of Washington hanging above. Text printed directly onto the reverse of the cardboard mount reads: Washington's Bed and Room Where He Died, (December 14, 1799.) Mount Vernon Mansion. Copyright by the Mount Vernon Ladies' Union Association. Luke C. Dillon, Authorized Photographer, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penna. Avenue, Washington City, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mount Vernon
p Mansion Interiors
